resources.string:
BeingCitizen in all its technology, aims to be a curated hyperlocal social media network. Our services aim to connect citizens with the relevant stakeholders from the point of view of delivering Governance i.e. State legislators, executive, other government bodies as well as relevant citizens lying within the relevant governance boundaries at the Constituency/State/Country level.
This Privacy Policy (further referred to as ‘Policy’) lays down rules for how and when BeingCitizen uses and shares the information when you use the services on the Network between the various stakeholders i.e. Citizens, Government and Corporate Sector alike. We, at BeingCitizen respect your privacy and appreciate the sensitivity of all matters that will subsequently be put out in public domain and possibly scrutinized further outside the ambit of the Platform itself. Therefore, the minimum data collected across a user’s activity on the platform to further improve the user experience on the platform of BeingCitizen itself.
Henceforth, this Policy document aims to list down feature-wise Privacy intention from the point of view of Users.

Campaigns: Campaigns become the action centres on the BeingCitizen Platform that brings together the Government apparatus to the Citizens. More so, to balance the equation and add credibility to the platform, the identity of the creator of the Campaign and its followers becomes relevant even for his corresponding MLA to address the desired change and therefore visible to all users.

The ‘Community’: These, as a feature, necessitate opinion and for that reason, the identity of the users using the feature thereby is discoverable by all users to the platform alike. The information as gathered from these platforms can be discovered either by rendering to other users upon their use of the platform or could otherwise be discoverable through the user profiles. The data as generated can the stored by the website and could be used offline to analyse the relevant opinion from the use of the hash tags as provided and used.

Blogs, Debates & Cartoons: These elements are discoverable and promote user engagement within the BeingCitizen platform.

Polls: Polls instigate user opinion over any kind of a broad theme that the platform does support. This can range to a host of topics that might be ranging to a sponsored interest to an opinion poll.
By Creating An Account, You Agree To Being Citizen\'s Terms Of Services. Privacy Policy. Cookie Policy & Content Policies
